CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Opportunity__c)) && Opportunity__r.IsClosed && Opportunity__r.IsWon, '8 - Closed Won', IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Opportunity__c)) && Opportunity__r.IsClosed, '9 - Closed Lost', IF( Current_Funnel_Status__c = 'Suspect', '1 - Suspect', IF( Current_Funnel_Status__c = 'Inquiry', '2 - Inquiry', IF( Current_Funnel_Status__c = 'MQL', '3 - MQL', IF( Current_Funnel_Status__c = 'TAL', '4 - TAL', IF( Current_Funnel_Status__c = 'TQO', '5 - TQO', IF( Current_Funnel_Status__c = 'SAO', '6 - SAO', IF( Current_Funnel_Status__c = 'SQO', '7 - SQO', IF( Current_Funnel_Status__c = 'Recycle', '10 - Recycled', IF( Current_Funnel_Status__c = 'Reject', '11 - Rejected','')))))))))))
CustomField.label: Current Funnel Status
